body: Well this is sad but good👌

it just seem like the story are meant to build up frustration in the characters. and frustration can lead into infidelity and you know what that's a recipe for? Netorare. I get the feeling that these story could be building up to some of the most heart wrenching Netorare stories ever read.
WHY ARE THEY SO SAD!? LIKE ITS SUCH S TURN ON BUT THEN ITS SAD..I really want a part two where she finally tucks her as well..
This author makes the saddest stories ever ;-;
